comment.author: 13227401@N05
comment._content:
My parents read many a book from the Bremersdorp Library in Manzini during the later 1960s, and my mum probably helped out there on occasion. It was situated just behind the old Post Office. It might be still standing, who knows, but as they built a new Library I doubt now whether the Bremersdorp Library is still operational.

The other photo looks like it has been taken in Mbabane - and is probably the PWD workshops.

comment.author: 65043758@N02
comment._content: Vehicle is a Canadian Military Pattern (CMP cab 13) Chevrolet C60S or C60L.
